features: Clinical Strength gives you 2X better sweat protection* (*Vs. the protection required of an ordinary antiperspirant)

body.description: Never let them see you sweat! Did you know that heat, activity, and stress can all cause you to sweat and that stress sweat smells the WORST? That's because stress sweat comes from a different gland, causing more bacteria and more odor. That's why Secret Clinical Strength is clinically stress-tested and fomulated with 4X the stress-sweat protection* to help stop sweat and odor before they start. Secret Clinical Strength has 2X better sweat protection,* giving you clinically proven, prescription-strength protection. Secret Clinical Strength Soft Solid is formulated with skin-soothing conditioners to minimize irritation and soothe dry, tender underam skin, while its Stress Response™ scent delivers an invigorating citrus aroma all day long. Secret Clinical Strength offers the wetness protection of a prescription-strength product but with less irritation, making it perfect for everyday use. Secret Clinical Strength Soft Solid—superior protection to take on even the most stressful days. *Vs. the protection required of an ordinary antiperspirant

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best deodorant and I’ve tried about 20 not kidding
reviews.reviewText: I looked for a deodorant for about 8 months. I was a fan of native especially the cool scents but not the price or the fact it gave me a horrible itchy rash or the fact that it balled up constantly and created those disgusting deodorant balls. It’s supposed to be natural yet gave me symptoms of what you would think chemicals would do. I am super finicky about smells. I absolutely hate that secret fresh powder or floral smell. It makes me gag. Uh. Arm and hammer was a weird consistency and I have long days where I leave at 7 am and don’t get home till 10 pm. I hate having to put deodorant on 2 times a day or more. I tried about 15 other ones so I’ll spare you those deets. LOOK NO FURTHER. This deodorant is #1 best I tried out of everything. Works so good and I only have to apply it once and it lasts all day with absolutely no sign of B.O. The consistency weirded me out because I had never used the soft invisible solid kind you have to pump up, but omg I also absolutely hate deodorant balls! 🤢 That’s never happened with this deodorant! I can’t tell you how happy I am to finally find one that works so good and checks all the boxes. The smell of this one has grown on me and I absolutely love this product. Sorry for the novel but if you knew how much time and money I spent trying to find a good one, then you would understand the passion and excitement around this review! 10 STARS!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Womens' Deodorant I've Found
reviews.reviewText: I think a lot of womens' deodorants tend to be super weak and ineffective, even for short periods of time. Ever since I found this one in particular, I have NEVER looked back...lol. Works great and is super effective for longer periods of time.Using other brands prior, I always felt really paranoid as to whether it actually worked, but with this one I never have to worry. Would definitely recommend. Wish it was slightly cheaper but it does work really well.

reviews.reviewText: Containers are small but it works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deodorant, best scent (and why)
reviews.reviewText: I love this deodorant! Some things to note- I am quite smell-sensitive, and am picky about my personal scents.I also have overactive adrenal glands(I sweat a lot) after some head/brain injuries, and BEFORE finding Secret Clinical Strength Line of Soft Solids, I had felt like I was always wanting/needing to reapply deodorant midday. (I have tried the “Clinical” lines of Dove, Mitchum, Degree, etc. and none was as good as Secret overall, with scent, comfort, and efficacy.)I only use this brand/line now, and I’ve used many of the different scents- THIS stress response citrus is my absolute fave!The scent is light and fresh, not overpowering but enough to help a lady not smell like body odor-armpit sweat, even after a good workout! I work out at least 3 times a week, and after a shower I don’t feel like I have to reapply deodorant with this line (I use 1 to 2 clicks on clean underarms, & I’m good to go). This soft solid is also moisturizing, and soothing after I shave my underarms.I’d totally recommend this product, it’s my go-to antiperspirant and deodorant!*This is all my own opinion and I was NOT given any free or discounted stuff to write a review. I rely a lot on detailed reviews for products I buy, so I’m just trying to return the favor!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn't get right product this time
reviews.reviewText: I love the stress response soft solid, it smells really good and it works all day long. But I didn't get the right product this time. I got free & sensitive which has no scent. Not sure if it works bc I've never used it. I'm extremely unhappy bc it's not what I bought & I could have got this un-scented stuff at Walmart for cheaper! The stress response is harder to find bc it's always sold out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best OTC Deodorant Hands Down!
reviews.reviewText: This is, by far, the best nonprescription deodorant and antiperspirant I have ever used. It’s also the cleanest/best/freshest smelling! It truly works for the amount of time it says it will and doesn’t irritate my skin. Also, it doesn’t cake or gunk up in your creases and it doesn’t leave the oil spots or stains in your clothing. I’m very particular about how my deodorants smell, and this truly is the crème de la crème of scents. I can’t do powder or shower clean because my brain instantly associates both scents with body odor and it makes me ridiculously anxious.. This has a light & fresh floral scent that doesn’t smell like deodorant so you don’t have to fear that you’re wafting it into anyone’s face. I’m a nervous and active sweater and this controls both. I LOVE the stress response feature. Do yourself a solid(or whichever formula you prefer) and order this product today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells Great and Doesn’t Irritate My Skin
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this stuff for years, but generally gravitate toward the light and fresh scent. I tried the stress response this time around and, though a bit stronger, I very much enjoy the scent.I love this deodorant because it lasts all day, literally, and actually works. When I was younger, I had a problem with excessive sweating; as a result, though no longer a sweaty teenager, I fear the pit stains. With this product, I fear being a sweaty Betty no more!Lastly, my skin is ridiculously sensitive when it comes to shaving. Some deodorants irritate my skin even further, but not Secret Clinical Strength: It glides I’m easily and smoothly, and moisturizes my skin. My armpits no longer get razor bumps when applying deodorant.In summary, if you’re really good at sweating, prone to skin irritations, and in the market for a long-lasting deodorant that only needs to be applied once a day, then I highly recommend this product. (Added bonus: it’s way cheaper on Amazon than in stores).
